Output.Description: Data satisfying query in the form of 'Signal' instances.

nio/MySQLInsert.Description: Stores input signals in a MySQL database.

Input.Description: A record will be inserted into the database for each input signal.

target_table.description: Allows to specify/calculate table name from signal

Output.Description: A signal containing number of successfully added items

nio/MySQLBase.Description: Stores input signals in a MySQL database.

retry_timeout.description: When disconnected, this specifies how long to wait before attempting to connect.

commit_after_query.description: Whether or not to issue a commit after a query is executed.
